snippet: Holding court inside the hotel lobby at the annual general managers meeting, Sandy Alderson deadpanned his way through a question-and-answer session.
abstract: New York Mets general manager Sandy Alderson cracks jokes about sad state of team's outfield, while giving updates on contract negotiations with pitcher R A Dickey and third baseman David Wright.
lead_paragraph: Holding court inside the hotel lobby at the annual general managers meeting, Sandy Alderson deadpanned his way through a question-and-answer session.

headline.seo: Alderson, Mets’ G.M., Assesses Team With Humor
headline.main: For Mets, a Revival Is a Thing to Smile At
headline.print_headline: For Mets, A Revival Is a Thing To Smile At
